Join 65+ million customers worldwide and 12 million in the UK

valueProps.text: Move freely between countries and currencies

facts.text: Revolut is an all-in-one finance app.
facts.evidence: Revolut | All-in-one finance app for your money
You’re on the United Kingdom website.

facts.text: Revolut allows movement between countries and currencies.
facts.evidence: Home or away, local or global —move freely between countries and currencies.
Sign up for free, in a tap.

facts.text: Revolut has 12 million customers in the UK.
Revolut is the #3 most downloaded finance app.
Revolut has a Trustpilot rating of 4.6 out of 5.
Revolut won Best International Payments Provider 2025.
Revolut won Best Consumer Banking Mobile App 2025.
Revolut offers points on purchases redeemable for Airline Miles.
facts.evidence: Earn points on your purchases with one of our debit cards. Then redeem them for Airline Miles and more.

facts.text: Some Revolut cards are available on paid plans only.
facts.evidence: Some cards available on paid plans only.

facts.text: Revolut offers virtual cards for Apple or Google Wallet.
facts.evidence: Create and add virtual cards to Apple or Google Wallet to start paying right away.

facts.text: Revolut offers up to 4.5% AER on savings.
facts.evidence: Grow your money with up to 4.5% AER/Gross (variable) interest rate on Savings, paid every day.

facts.text: Revolut's savings interest rate is variable.
facts.evidence: The interest rate is variable and subject to your selected plan.
